title: Log in as a Club Scout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a Club Scout
AND user navigates to https://prospectlinkstg.mlb.com/prospect/saml/login
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters username test-yankees@yankees.com
AND user enters password Autumn1!
AND user clicks the Sign In button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects in the same tab to the DP Club dashboard: https://prospectlinkstg.mlb.com/#/dashboard
AND the Draft Prospects Link logo appears in the upper left corner
AND the user name appears as T.Yankees

Login page
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19768)

Dashboard
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19767)

title: Club Scout accesses Prospects list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a Club Scout
AND user is on the dashboard screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the top nav item "Prospects"
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects in the same tab to show the list of Prospects.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19769)

title: Club Scout opens and closes invitations modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a Club Scout
AND user is on the Prospects page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the blue button with the white "plus" icon
custom_expected:
THEN the invitations modal appears
AND the modal has a Close X in the upper right corner

AND when user clicks the X
THEN the modal disappears
AND user is back on the Prospects page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19770)

title: Club Scout starts creating a new questionnaire then cancels it
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a Club Scout with permission to create a questionnaire
AND user is anywhere on the site
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the top nav item "Questionnaires"
custom_expected:
THEN a dropdown menu appears
AND the top item in the menu is Create New Questionnaire

AND WHEN user clicks on Create New Questionnaire
THEN the New Questionnaire modal appears
AND the modal has a Close X in the upper right corner

AND WHEN user clicks on the Close X
THEN the modal disappears
AND user is back on the page they started on.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19772)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19771)

title: Club Scout navigates back to dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a Club Scout
AND user is anywhere on the site
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Draft Prospects Link logo in the upper left corner
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects in the same tab to the Dashboard.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19773)
